name: TheAtlantic
text: At a time when in-person social interaction is so limited, podcasts can help bring chatter, and new voices, back into our lives and homes. The latest Atlantic Daily, from @mimbsy: https://t.co/A9JtikrOrB

name: TheAtlantic
text: Louis DeJoy assuaged concerns about the intent of his changes to the mail, but not about the consequences they might have for the election, @russellberman writes: https://t.co/XJuxfn6gpS

name: TheAtlantic
text: Even in the best White House relationships, presidents and their VPs run into differences. How they hash them out is a test of character, @ElizabethDrewOH writes. https://t.co/rW89wcm8g7
